column4: Did the company own or manage any physical sites during the reporting period?
This goal applies to companies that own or manage a physical site (such as a factory, warehouse, offices, other fixed assets, or transport routes).
Please provide a brief description of why this goal did not apply to the company during the reporting period.
What was the total number of separate physical sites owned or managed the company during the reporting period?
Physical sites owned / managed by the company, total
Did the company have any employees during the reporting period?
This goal applies to all companies that have employees.
